snippet.title: Police hunt for large stolen boat
snippet.content: POLICE are calling for information regarding the theft of a large boat from a Bees Creek property. The boat was stolen from the property between July 25 and 28, Strike Force Trident Detective Senior Sergeant Mark Bland said. He said the boat was an 8-metre aluminium single hull vessel with an inboard Yamaha 240 diesel motor. He said the boat was hoisted on a tri-axle trailer when it was stolen. Anyone with information about this boat is asked to contact police on 131 444 or Crime Stoppers on 1800 333 000.

sindex.name: Strike Force Trident Detective Senior Sergeant Mark Bland
